name: LimitedFinance
short_description: LIFI is a community managed token with limited 14,300 tokens, Total transparency making sure that the price of the token will not decrease in the future.
description: Limited Finance is a Blockchain technology deflationary token. It simplifies the creation of payment systems powered by smart contract technology, which will be forked in the near future and become one of the most powerful and valuable crypto. Future implementation of Loyalty and rewards platform will make LIFI even more reliable Token
